description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6c2b8","text":"This Rabies whole genome sequencing protocol has been derived and modified from the Illumina COVIDSeq RUO sequencing pipeline. The protocol has been modified and optimised for sequencing Rabies virus (RABV). The methodology uses RABV-specific primers that have been designed in-house. In brief, the RNA is extracted from samples and converted to cDNA. RABV sequencing library is generated and sequenced using MiSeq.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Department of Neurovirology, National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences
